title: My Horse, My Partner: Teamwork on the Ground
description: This is an easy-to-follow instruction guide to creating a steady horse that respects and trusts his handler for a lifetime. Wysocky, a longtime horse trainer, shows how to use a toolkit of everyday items, such as halters, , leads, long lines, plastic bags, toys, towels, and voice commands, along with a variety of specialized ground exercises, to desensitize and build confidence with horses of all types and in all disciplines. Illustrated with black and white photos throughout the book, MY HORSE, MY PARTNER helps horse and human forge an amazing bond with each other as they go through this process together.Lisa Wysocky is a horse trainer and motivational speaker. She lives in Nashville and is also the author of The Power of Horses .
author: Lisa Wysocky
